title: Black Friday 2019 DEALS DEALS DEALS
description: It's Black Friday 2019 which means time to spend that  Check out the LG NanoCell on sale!  The LG XBOOM Go PK7 speakers:  XBOOM UK link:   Xbox One X for $350 at the Microsoft Store:  Xbox One S bundle for $200 at Target:  Xbox One S All Digital for $150 at the Microsoft Store:  Our video on the Xbox SAD:   PS4 1TB bundle for $200 at Best Buy:   No good deals on the Nintendo Switch but make sure if you're looking for one to get the Red Box Switch:   Apple Watch Series 3 for $129 at Walmart:  Apple AirPods 2 for $129 at Walmart:  iPad 10.2" for $250 at Target:  Our video on the new base iPad:   MacBook Air for $899 at Best Buy:  MacBook Pro for $1099 at Best Buy:  Our video on the new MacBook Pro:   Surface Pro 7 Core i3 bundle for $699 at the Microsoft Store:  Surface Pro 7 Core i5 bundle for $799 at the Microsoft Store:   None of the Target gift card smartphone links are live yet (might be in-store only?) Google Pixel 3a for $300 with $50 gift card at Best Buy:   Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
